author: gawor
msg: GERONIMODEVTOOLS-718, GERONIMODEVTOOLS-747: Simplify how updating a bundle within EBA is done. Don't cache bundle ids since they change all the time and lead to problems when updating. Also fix the 'remove module when stopped' problem.

author: norman
msg: Get ready for supporting Quotas. See MAILBOX-64

author: gawor
msg: GERONIMODEVTOOLS-707: Module can be in some state between started & stopped so also check available modules before removing

author: stsp
msg: Fix issue #3664, "SASL support in inetd mode caused SIGSEGV during shutdown".
Make sure svnserve pool cleanup handlers that call sasl_dispose()
and sasl_done() are run in the right order.
Patch by: Alec Kloss <alec.kloss at oracle.com>
(main): Create a subpool to handle the connection in inetd mode as well.

author: todd
msg: HDFS-2003. Separate FSEditLog reading logic from edit log memory state building logic. Contributed by Ivan Kelly.
